subject: re:Don't miss this unique chance
body:
Dear customer.
It's not a secret that there are lots of online pharmacies that cheat their clients by selling fake drugs in order to make extra profits. We don't. 
CanadianPharmacy warns you about the growing threat of drug poisoning caused by low-quality medications sold by underground online pharmacies without a license. Choose the best and save on it purchase real generic medications from licensed manufacturers at CanadianPharmacy. Our prices will please you.
CanadianPharmacy save money on high-quality generic medications from Canada here.
Best regards,Newton Quintana
